description: This file serves as the client entry point for a Remix application, handling hydration of the app on the client side using React APIs.

classes.name: RemixBrowser
classes.description: Remix's client-side router component that manages app hydration and routing.

methods.name: hydrateRoot
methods.description: React DOM method to hydrate a server-rendered React application in a container.

methods.name: startTransition
methods.description: React method to schedule state updates with lower priority, used here to hydrate the app asynchronously.
